Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.responseToClients

Class ResponseToClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.responseToClients.ResponseToClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyCardActionResponse, EndProductionResponse, EndTurnResponse, EndTurnSingleGameResponse, InitialisingResponse, LeaderActionResponse, MarbleActionResponse, PingResponse, ProductionResponse, ShiftResourcesResponse, StartGameResponse, TwoLeaderWhiteMarblesResponse, WhiteMarblesConversionResponse, WinnerResponse
public class ResponseToClient
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the response to client. in particular, when the server have to notify a client for any reason (sending a message of error, update the game state, say the confirm of an action) create an object of this static type (not everytime dynamic) to send the notification

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ResponseToClient()
    this is the default constructor, that initialise every attribute with his default value
    ResponseToClient​(Status message)
    this constructor create a response to send to the client.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Status getMessage()
    this method get the string representing the message
    protected void hideLeaderCards​(java.util.List<ThinPlayer> players)
    this method hide the leader cards of a thin player, in fact the cards of a player different from the owner, when another player did not activate a leader card, should not be visible
    void updateClient​(View view)
    this method update the state of a client.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ResponseToClient

      public ResponseToClient()
      this is the default constructor, that initialise every attribute with his default value

    • ResponseToClient

      public ResponseToClient​(Status message)
      this constructor create a response to send to the client. in particular, it set the message and the attribute ignorePossibleCommands = true
      Parameters:
      message - this is the message to set

  • Method Details

    • updateClient

      public void updateClient​(View view)
      this method update the state of a client. in particular, it shows the message sent from the server and, if the command is not of dynamic type ResponseToClient, set the values that have to change after a model's change
      Parameters:
      view - this is the view to update

    • getMessage

      public Status getMessage()
      this method get the string representing the message
      Returns:
      the string representing message

    • hideLeaderCards

      protected void hideLeaderCards​(java.util.List<ThinPlayer> players)
      this method hide the leader cards of a thin player, in fact the cards of a player different from the owner, when another player did not activate a leader card, should not be visible
      Parameters:
      players - these are the player with the leader cards to hide
